attributes.action: Legislate against vicious trolling on social media.
attributes.background: Vicious, hateful intimidation or 'trolling' on social media has become extremely widespread. Social media companies need to be subject to the same legislative controls as currently apply to national press and broadcasting companies.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you mean by "legislate against vicious trolling". 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
